title: RIVERFRONT-Townhouse
posting_body: ['Available September 1st to15th.', 'Riverfront, on Warren Street, fantastic view of the Reperatory Theater and surrounded area across the Concord river.', 'Security doors with intercom, Condo located on 2nd floor with elevator available,', 'One bedroom with a Study room that can be used as 2nd bedroom.', 'Central to all commuter routes.', 'Next to Parking Garage and U-MASS Lowell In.', 'Behind Gateway Center professional building.', '1050 s.f. space, features central air, gas heat, granite counter top, all kitchen appliance, washer and dryer in the unit, mostly carpeted  and tiled kitchen floor.', 'Rent includes Heat, water.', 'One designated car space in the parking lot.', 'Pets require $50.00 additional rent.', 'Credit check fee$30.00.', 'Asking first, last and s. deposit, year lease,', 'Tenants fall in love with it, VERY PEACEFUL!!!.', ' Common areas are heated.', 'Send your info.', 'with details  in a text or call Tina, aat 978- 866- 7465 if there is no answer please leave message .']
